Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGOBE; ENGRAVED
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate cone-shaped lamp, ovoidal in outline, with a disc marked with moulding and a ribbon handle at the top. Paste of an orangey colour. The surface is covered with a reddish-coloured coating which is partially lost. On the disc we find a decoration in relief consisting of circles arranged radially. All around this is a decoration on the basis of garlands and circles. Signs of use in the light orifice.
